name: WikibaseCirrusSearch
author: The Wikidata team
Stas Malyshev
@note: The values below are mirrors of old Wikibase values. TODO: once Wikibase values are gone, put proper defaults here.

PrefixSearchProfile.description: Default label scoring profile name, for prefix search. See profiles in config/EntityPrefixSearchProfiles.php

PrefixSearchProfiles.description: Field weight profiles. These profiles specify relative weights of label fields for different languages, e.g. exact language match vs. fallback language match.

FulltextSearchProfile.description: Default profile name for fulltext search. See profiles in config/EntitySearchProfiles.php

InLabelSearchProfile.description: Default profile name for simple entity search by label. See profiles in config/EntityInLabelSearchProfiles.php

InLabelSearchProfiles.description: Profile definitions for simple entity search by label.

DefaultPrefixRescoreProfile.description: Default rescore profile for prefix search.

DefaultFulltextRescoreProfile.description: Default rescore profile for prefix search.

DefaultInLabelRescoreProfile.description: Default rescore profile for simple entity search by label.

LanguageSelectorRescoreProfile.description: Default rescore profile to use in the language selector context

LanguageSelectorPrefixSearchProfile.description: Default query builder profile to use in the language selector context

LanguageSelectorStatementBoost.description: Type (de)boosts for rescoring functions in the language selector context

LanguageSelectorRescoreFunctionChains.description: Function chains profiles used by the language selector context

UseStemming.description: List of languages that we want to have stemming analyzers.

LicenseMapping.description: Map of licence search strings to wikibase statements.
